sections.body: Guardians of history, time dragons are the most powerful of the outer dragons. Watchers and waiters, time dragons guard the universe against those that would interfere with the natural temporal order.

special_qualities: immortal, no breath, read the threads, starflight
name: Dragon, Outer, Time, Ancient
skills: Bluff +36, Diplomacy +36, Fly +16, Knowledge (arcana, geography, nobility, planes, religion) +36, Knowledge (history) +42, Perception +36, Sense Motive +36, Spellcraft +36
